thread.title: Cops release description of suspect in Mass. jogger murder | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Cops release description of suspect in Mass. jogger murder | Daily Mail Online

author: James Wilkinson For Dailymail.Com
title: Cops release description of suspect in Mass. jogger murder | Daily Mail Online
text: Breakthrough in case of Google executive, 27, who was raped and murdered while jogging six months ago as police use DNA evidence to build a description of her 'athletic Hispanic 30-something' killer DNA evidence from the murder of Vanessa Marcotte, 27, may have revealed killer Cops are seeking a Hispanic man of average height and athletic build, around 30 They say he had short or shaved hair and may have driven a dark SUV Marcotte was found raped and murdered near her mom's home on Aug 7, 2016 Cops say their man may have had scratches on his face, neck and hands They warned the public not to approach suspects, but to call police instead Published: 18:40 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 23:11 GMT, 23 February 2017 632 shares
